Res.tr: You need first to stop the server and then close the app.

Launch the web browser and enter the address: localhost:2504. Optionally, click on the chat link, then log in using the button in the bottom right corner with one of the predefined users: Amir (pwd: AmirA), Damir (pwd: DamirD), Emir (pwd: EmirE), or Samir (pwd: SamirS). Next, start the ChatClient application and click the connect button on the toolbar. Use one of the predefined users for the login. You can now exchange messages between the web browser and the C++ client application.
